config.use_small_grouping.name: Use small grouping
config.use_small_grouping.desc: Changes how the watering is done
config.refill_on_finish.name: Refill on finish
config.refill_if_lower.name: Refill if lower
config.refill_if_lower.desc: On refill after completion, it only refills if remaining percentage is less
config.redo_path_on_refill.name: Redo path on refill
config.redo_path_on_refill.desc: When refilling the pathfinding is calculated again
